channel.title: CVE Feed for JetBrains -- Ktor
channel.description: The latest CVEs for JetBrains -- Ktor

item.title: CVE-2022-29930|2024-08-03T06:33:43.149Z -- jetbrains -- ktor
item.description: SHA1 implementation in JetBrains Ktor Native 2.0.0 was returning the same value. The issue was fixed in Ktor version 2.0.1.

item.title: CVE-2022-38179|2024-08-03T10:45:52.874Z -- jetbrains -- ktor
item.description: JetBrains Ktor before 2.1.0 was vulnerable to the Reflect File Download attack

item.title: CVE-2022-29035|2024-08-03T06:10:58.321Z -- jetbrains -- ktor
item.description: In JetBrains Ktor Native before version 2.0.0 random values used for nonce generation weren't using SecureRandom implementations

item.title: CVE-2022-38180|2024-08-03T10:45:52.879Z -- jetbrains -- ktor
item.description: In JetBrains Ktor before 2.1.0 the wrong authentication provider could be selected in some cases
